questions.question_text:
Adam, a forensic investigator, is investigating an attack on Microsoft Exchange Server of a large organization. As the first step of the investigation, he examined the PRIV.EDB file and found the source from where the mail originated and the name of the file that disappeared upon execution. Now, he wants to examine the
MIME stream content. Which of the following files is he going to examine?

discussion.content:
To examine the MIME stream content in a Microsoft Exchange Server environment, Adam should look at:

A. PRIV.STM

The PRIV.STM file (privately stored streaming file) contains the MIME content of emails, which includes the message body and attachments, while PRIV.EDB contains the database of email metadata and other related information.

D. Deep Log Analyzer

This tool is specifically designed for detailed analysis and reporting on log data, making it particularly suited for analyzing web server logs.
D > it is a web analytics software for small and medium size websites.

questions.question_text: Which of the following tools will help the investigator to analyze web server logs?
Which of the following files gives information about the client sync sessions in Google Drive on Windows?

discussion.content: The “sync_log.log” is a plain text file that contains loads of information about events that have occurred within Google Drive – including creation, deletion, & modification events. These logs can even tell you if the event occurred on the local machine or if the event happened elsewhere.

Selected Answer: A
Google Drive on Windows typically logs information related to sync sessions in a file named "sync_log.log."

Selected Answer: A
https://cybersocialhub.com/csh/google-drive-evidence-you-should-know-about-monolith/

Sync_log.log

 MacOS Location: \Users\{USERNAME}\Library\Application Support\Google\Drive\user_default\sync_log.log
 Windows: \Users\{USERNAME}\appData\Local\Google\Drive\user_default\sync_log.log
 
--> sync_log.log

Selected Answer: A
In Google Drive on Windows, the file that gives information about the client sync sessions is sync_log.log. The correct answer is A. It is a plain text file that contains a detailed log of all client synchronization activity.

Selected Answer: C
SOX is correct!

questions.question_text: Which among the following is an act passed by the U.S. Congress in 2002 to protect investors from the possibility of fraudulent accounting activities by corporations?
Richard is extracting volatile data from a system and uses the command doskey/history. What is he trying to extract?

discussion.content:
Richard is using the command doskey /history to extract:

B. Previously typed commands

The doskey /history command lists the commands that have been typed in the Command Prompt session, which can provide insight into user activities and commands executed.
B. Dosky/history adds all command history,
